name: 2D Shooter (nashifyu)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Proposed Modifications:

1) I will create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2)I plan to add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in my game.

3) I am going to reskin the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character.

Credits:

Created by Yusuf Nashif
